name: deviantART - Project: BlueGreen
description:
Adds changes to profile pages (including gallery/favourites pages):

- Blue links rather than grey
- Green polls instead of orange

-----------------------------

If you just want the poll and pageview stats styling, remove everything under the line /* Links Restyling */ (except the very, very last }) and then Save.

This removes all of the blue links, leaving them their original colour.

-----------------------------
Changelog:
-----------------------------

31st January, 2009 - Added larger fonts on date for the Pageview Stats page - thanks to `zetab (http://zetab.deviantart.com/) for the suggestion   
                                    Added data URI's and styling for official deviantART polls - thanks to `electricjonny (http://electricjonny.deviantart.com)

30th January, 2009 - Added styling for message centre poll results - thanks to ^Ikue (http://ikue.deviantart.com/)
